entry.title: RT swaresh binaykiya: Power of Decentralized Storage Imagine you're an avid photographer, capturing precious moments of life. You store these memories...
entry.summary: RT swaresh binaykiya Power of Decentralized Storage Imagine you're an avid photographer, capturing precious moments of life. You store these memories in a cloud service. One day, the unexpected happens – a server glitch wipes out your entire gallery. Heart-wrenching, right?

entry.title: 🚨🚨🚨 PLEASE BE EXTREMELY CAREFUL Major exploit reported in Ledger's connectkit library... General recommendation out there is don't interact w...
entry.summary:
🚨🚨🚨 PLEASE BE EXTREMELY CAREFUL Major exploit reported in Ledger's connectkit library... General recommendation out there is don't interact with any dApps until the exploit is better understood.
banteg: 🚨 ledger library confirmed compromised and replaced with a drainer. wait out interacting with any dapps till things become clearer. https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/connect-kit@1

Livepeer: Introducing the Livepeer Studio CLI 🔑 ⚡️ As part of a massive upgrade to Livepeer docs and developer experience, we're releasing a new command line tool that lets developers get a @livepeerstudio API key and launch an ultra low latency video app in seconds💨 🚀

entry.title: Ever heard about layers and asked yourself what it means? 😵 @Jamiescript will tell you! 🚀
entry.summary:
Ever heard about layers and asked yourself what it means? 😵 @Jamiescript will tell you! 🚀
Jamiebones: #30daysoftext Day 12 Write about blockchain scalability solutions. Blockchain scaling solutions are a race against congestion. As blockchain technology gains traction, its scalability has emerged as a major challenge.

entry.title: Sharding, rollups, and more explained by @iaminiekanem 🤓
entry.summary:
Sharding, rollups, and more explained by @iaminiekanem 🤓
Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔶🔸Blockchain Scalability Solutions🔸🔶 Blockchain scalability is the ability of a blockchain to handle an increasing number of transactions without compromising performance and efficiency It is a multifaceted challenge that's being solved as blockchains gain more adoption 🧵
